Promoting positive credit culture across Africa.

We offer several services that improve on transparency, accountability
and fairness in giving or receiving credit.

We’ve built trust with over 10+ brands across sub-saharan africa

To ensure that deserving
individuals have access to affordable credit support when they need it

We are able to achieve this using the following products and services below...

We are passionate about providing solutions which accelerate our objectives. We believe if credit is readily available, it would go a long way in meeting global SDG goals on financial inclusion and poverty alleviation.

Our Services

Contract
Manager

Create legally acceptable loan contracts effortlessly. Do same before you give out Credit
goods or Services.

Learn More

Lender Marketplace

Gain access to Loan offers from over 200 lenders. We match you with Loan opportunites that work specifically for you.

Learn More

Connector
Service

Gain insight into borrowers’ credit habits before making decisions. It all starts with access to the right data

Learn More

Agent
Verification

Before you sign up that MobileMoney Merchant, confirm they meet your organisational’s intergrity standards.

Learn More

Many ask why we do this, our response is simple. Why not us? We aim to...

Increase credit accessibility by 42%   via formal and informal channels

Decrease NPL to 3%  from all our direct recommendations.
